data.text:
OUR MISSION - Ezekiel 34:1-16

Love in service

Seeking out the lost for the King

(Loving Jesus)

Bridging the gap between the lost and the faithful (Loving humanity)

Raising a generation of devoted worshippers (Loving our church)

OUR VISION - Isaiah 61: 1-11

To Promote awareness of

God’s Kingdom

By making disciples in every nation

By demonstrating the power of God

through Miracles, Signs and Wonders

OUR CORE-VALUE – Malachi 3:16 -18

Life time commitment to serve the

King of Kings and Mankind

Committed to the service of God

with our Talents, Treasures, and Time

Committed to the service of the needy in

and outside our domain

Meet The Pastors

Rev. Agbo and his wife Rev Dr. Evelyn Godwin are the senior pastors of King’s Favor Ministries Int’l in Greenville, SC. The two pastors were raised respectively in a Christian home with godly heritage and Pentecostal endowment. As they answered the call of God upon their lives, they attended West Africa Bible College of the International Pentecostal Holiness Church Nigeria.

They subsequently furthered their seminary education in United State. They were ordained evangelical Pentecostalism ministers with many years of service in God’s kingdom. God led these His servants to start King’s Favor Ministries Int’l with a vision to impact Upstate of South Carolina, and the nations of the world with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

Pastor Evelyn’s Music Ministry has been tremendously enriching souls of many people all over the world. They are dynamic church planters, inspirational preachers, and teachers of the undiluted Word of God.

Teachings

Connect

Outreach

Local Outreach

Committed to serving those in need within and around our local community

Committed to local evangelism and outreach

Global Outreach

Promote awareness of God’s kingdom by making disciples in every nation

Engaging in short-term and long-term mission support
